title.narrative: Disadvantaged Girls Incentive Programme for Secondary Education in Odisha

description.narrative: This activity (Disadvantaged Girls Incentive Programme for Secondary Education in Odisha) is a component of Disadvantaged Girls Incentive Programme for Secondary Education in Odisha reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £14,696,754. This component benefits India, and works in the following sector(s): Secondary education, Social Protection. , with the following implementing partners: India Development .Foundation, IPE Global Private Limited. The start date is 19-02-2013 and the end date is 31-07-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
